title: The Magnificent Lizzie Brown and the Mysterious Phantom
description: A mysterious Phantom is terrorizing London, and when Lizzie realizes she has a talent that will let her stop the crimes before they happen, she and her new circus friends feel compelled to intervene. But when one of their own is blamed for the crimes instead, their investigation takes a turn for the worse.When the truth finally comes out, the real culprit is the last person anyone expects."
author: Vicki Lockwood
